      • isProductInUseByOffer

        @RolesAllowed(value={"FindOffer","FindProduct"})
public boolean isProductInUseByOffer(ProductEto product)
        Checks, whether a given ProductEto is in use by at least one OfferEto.
        Specified by:
        isProductInUseByOffer in interface UcFindOffer
        Parameters:
        product - product to check if it is in use
        Returns:
        true, if there are no offers, that use the given ProductEto. false otherwise.

        Specified by:
        findOffersFiltered in interface UcFindOffer
        Parameters:
        offerFilterBo - is the offers filter criteria
        sortBy - is the OfferSortBy attribute, which defines the sorting.
        Returns:
        the List with all OfferEtos that match the OfferFilter criteria.
